Fast-Food Clone

MCDONALD'S EGG MCMUFFIN CLONE (40G PROTEIN)

All the nostalgia of the classic McMuffin with MORE THAN DOUBLE the protein. Our version packs 40g protein vs the original 17g - same great taste!

40g
Protein
320
Calories
15m
Total Time
1
Yield

Nutrition per 1 sandwich

Carbs26g
Fat10g
Fiber2g
Sugar3g
Sodium580mg
DifficultyEasy

VS. MCDONALDS

Compared to the original Egg McMuffin:

+135%
More Protein
17g → 40g
-0%
Fewer Calories
310 → 320
-25%
Less Sodium
770mg → 580mg

INGREDIENTS

  • 1 whole wheat English muffin
  • 2 large eggs
  • 120ml (4 oz) liquid egg whites
  • 60g turkey Canadian bacon (2 slices)
  • 1 slice reduced-fat American cheese
  • Cooking spray
  • Salt and pepper

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Prep Ring

Use a round cookie cutter or egg ring sprayed with cooking oil. Place in a heated pan over medium heat.

2

Cook Eggs

Crack whole eggs into a bowl with egg whites, beat lightly. Pour into the ring to create a round patty. Season with salt and pepper. Cook 3 minutes, flip, cook 2 more minutes.

3

Heat Meat

While eggs cook, warm Canadian bacon in the pan.

4

Toast

Toast the English muffin until golden.

5

Assemble

Layer: bottom muffin, Canadian bacon, egg patty, cheese (let it melt from egg heat), top muffin.
